description: This app is great just the works only pleny of options, noce font selections. Ability to add different English Bibles . Consider adding Indonesian TB translation iff possible.
summary: Well thought out and yet simple Bible app

description: This is a well planned and beautifully executed bible. Many many translations which are often forgotten unfortunately. This should be on android.! Love it !!
summary: Best Bible App in the world!

description:
